title: Intel Core i5-12500 vs AMD Ryzen 5 5500: Which budget CPU to buy?
content:
AMD recently announced a handful of new CPUs as a part of its Spring update. Out of all the available options in the Ryzen 5000 series, the Ryzen 5 5500 is now the most affordable option out there. We already compared the Ryzen 5 5500 and the Ryzen 5 5600 earlier to find out which

The post Intel Core i5-12500 vs AMD Ryzen 5 5500: Which budget CPU to buy? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In this article, we're going to take a look at the Intel core i5-12500 vs ryzen 5 5500 comparison to find out which one's better.
